code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./css/TopPlayers.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TopPlayers(){const[topPlayersMap,setTopPlayersMap]=useState({});const[playerData,setPlayerData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const navigate=useNavigate();const PLAYERS_JSON_URL='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ashwint87/cricket-website/master/top_players.json';useEffect(()=>{fetch(PLAYERS_JSON_URL).then(res=>res.json()).then(json=>{const list=Object.entries(json).map(_ref=>{let[id,info]=_ref;return{id,name:info.name,image:info.image};});setPlayerData(list);setLoading(false);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-players-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Top Players"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/player",children:"View All"})]}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"top-players-loading",children:"Loading top players..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"top-players-grid",children:playerData.map(player=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-player-card",onClick:()=>navigate("/player/".concat(player.id)),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:player.image,alt:player.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:player.name})]},player.id))})]});}
